thread.section_title: Hotel Trinite Haussmann - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel & location
thread.title_full: Great hotel & location - Review of Hotel Trinite Haussmann, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Angela407b
title: Great hotel & location
text: In Paris for trade show in January. Stayed at the Trinite haussmann Hotel which was close to Pigalle Metro station. Rooms are spacious, very clean & staff helpful. Buffet breakfast serviced but no restaurant or bar onsite. Many Restaurants close by with very good quality food and service.
